dialogStrings:
[Save Point]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.

Cannot take on anymore Materia.
Please discard some Materia.

{Cloud}
“This is the Shinra's Gelnika type airplane…
I wonder why it went down here?”

{Cloud}
“What is this place?
Must be some kind of a Research Establishment
because there's a Mako generator.”

{Cloud}
“This is terrible…
It's all messed up…”

Reno
“We just seem to keep running into
each other lately!”

Reno
“There were weapons and
Materia developed solely
to destroy Sephiroth.”

Rude
“But, it was attacked
by Weapon and sunk to
the bottom of the sea.”

Reno
“I can't give you what's here.
We'll take out Sephiroth.”{PAUSE}“I guess this is
our last meeting.”

Rude
“I won't let you
get in our way.”

{Cloud}
“So Shinra's new, secret
weapon was on this Airship…”
